703801f-a.text:
Conover Street, east side, from Wolcott to Sullivan Streets, showing Public School No. 30. The part of the school shown in this view is on Wolcott Street and was erected in 1868.
Board of Education of the City of New York September 4, 1930
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE
703801f-a.folder: Conover Street & Wolcott Street, Brooklyn, NY

703802f-a.text:
Conover Street, east side, from Wolcott to Sullivan Streets, showing Public School No. 30. This is a modern addition to the old P.S. 30 that was erected in 1868 and stands just to the east of this building.
Board of Education of the City of New York September 4, 1930
703802f-a.folder: Conover Street & Wolcott Street, Brooklyn, NY

707443f-a.text:
Wolcott Street, north side, east of Conover Street, showing part of P. S. No. 30 and Christ Chapel.
May 18, 1935.
P.L. Sperr.
707443f-a.folder: Wolcott St. & Conover St., Brooklyn, NY
